Package cs3500.easyanimator.view

Interface IView

All Known Subinterfaces:
IView2
All Known Implementing Classes:
ViewImplSVG, ViewImplTextual, ViewImplVisual, ViewImplVisualControllable2
public interface IView
The interface for our view class. Creates the visual representation of the animator to the client. Can support 'read only' models for better data retrieval.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addFeatureListeners​(IControllerFeatures features)
    Passes the features of the controller of type IControllerFeatures to the view.
    void showView()
    Creates the view's visuals that is intended to be made as per the implementation and type of view.

  • Method Details

    • addFeatureListeners

      void addFeatureListeners​(IControllerFeatures features)
      Passes the features of the controller of type IControllerFeatures to the view. Allows the view to retrieve these features from the controller to execute the proper reaction.
      Parameters:
      features - the possible actions that the controller supports, of type IControllerFeatures

    • showView

      void showView()
      Creates the view's visuals that is intended to be made as per the implementation and type of view.
